name: POM
description:
What the POM does...

 - Creates a surface upon which gymnasts of all ages and levels can train without causing severe wrist damage

 - Establish a standard piece of equipment that can support the skill development of the gymnast

 - Add a colorful, lightweight and portable pommel horse station that can bridge the gap between traditional mushrooms and pommel horse.

We know that 70% or more of top male gymnasts suffer chronic wrist pain. Itâ€™s one of our biggest overuse injuries in the sport. So lets start using equipment that can minimise the risk of such injuries.

The POM is available in Red (leatherette)

The size of the POM is - 
50cm Long
22cm High
48cm Wide
